subject: Your Brainbench Account Information Is Enclosed.
body:
=================================================================
Please save this message!  At the end of this e-mail, you'll find 
your account information.  You'll need this information in order 
to access your Brainbench account.
=================================================================


Dear Zombie Warwick,

Welcome to Brainbench! We're delighted that you have chosen us as your partner in securing improved skills, a great resume, and a better position at work.  As a new member of the Brainbench community, you can get started right away: 

8 Ways to Put Brainbench to Work for You Right Now

1.  Take some FREE tests--A great way to get a feel for how certification tests give you direct feedback on your skill level. 
http://www.brainbench.com/links/tofreetests.html  

2. Take a FREE personality assessment-A great way to make sure that your career is taking you in the right direction! 60 questions. 10 minutes. http://www.brainbench.com/links/personality.jsp 

3. Visit our Skills Center--Choose from over over 600 skills to measure, improve, and certify. 
 http://www.brainbench.com/xml/bb/skillscenter/skillscenter.xml  

4. Visit our Job Role Center--See which job role certifications can help you achieve your career goals. 
http://www.brainbench.com/xml/bb/skillscenter/jobrolecenter.xml  
  
5. Modify your "My Brainbench" personal preferences. 
http://www.brainbench.com/links/toprefs.html 

6. Check out your Brainbench Online Account--Store all of your test and certification results right here. You can share your information with current and future employers.
http://www.brainbench.com/xml/bb/transcript/build/modifyinfo.xml

7. Explore Subscription Plans--Get access to more resources at a lower subscription rate. Choose the subscription plan that suits you the best.  
http://www.brainbench.com/links/topricing.html    

8. Any questions?--Check out our Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) at: 
http://www.brainbench.com/links/tofaqs.html

Or contact our Customer Support team at: 
http://www.brainbench.com/xml/bb/common/customersupport.xml 


Finally -- be assured that you're in good hands.

- Brainbench is the #1 Certification Provider in the world, with over 6 million members. 
- Brainbench works with Booz Allen Hamilton, CACI, EDS, Ford Motor Company,
H&R Block, IBM, Interwoven, JPMorgan, Kaiser Permanente, Manpower,
Prometric, SAIC, Siemens, TAC Worldwide, U.S. Government Agencies, Verizon,
and Wells Fargo, as well as many other leading employers.



Once again, welcome to Brainbench!

Sincerely,


Mike Littman
Vice President, Product Marketing
Brainbench

=================================================================

Your Brainbench Account Information

The logon information for your account is as follows:

Logon ID:   ktwarwic@speedy.uwaterloo.ca
Password:   12345678

Your password is case sensitive.

You can log on to your account at http://www.brainbench.com.

=================================================================
